trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli is worried about the predations of hungry fiends.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any u'outs that appear.
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_000<tab>It's heartening to see Dock Poga so vibrant and bustling, but the increased traffic has drawn some...unwanted visitors.
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_001<tab>We're facing an infestation of u'outs. If we're to protect our customers from those roving seedkin, we'll need to routinely thin their numbers...

TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_002<tab>I'd appreciate the assistance of our special advisor in this matter! Sightings have been reported in the Stride of the Sun. Please survey the area and deal with any u'outs that emerge!
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_004<tab>Thank you for dealing with the seedkin. For the time being, our customers need not fear their predations.
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_005<tab>In fact, we've just taken delivery of an extract known to ward off u'outs and their ilk. I plan to spread the repellent in the area as an additional precaution.
TEXT_BANPEL103_05201_YUBLI_000_006<tab>That said, such measures are by no means permanent. When the creatures return, I hope I can count on your help again!
